basics.name: Jeremy Wright (Resume WIP)
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: My name is Jeremy Wright. I am a cloud software engineer and full stack developer. Over the years, I have familiarized myself with a variety of applications from the MEAN stack to Azure cloud development for scaling file storage solutions. Recently, I have taken an interest in quantum computing and have been investigating the nature of the computing framework and the problems it specializes in solving. When I have free time, I usually find myself playing games with friends. Recently, I have taken up photography and digital editing as a hobby.

highlights: Early work on throughput and availability metrics as well as paper and language support for an OCR application.

work.summary: Worked as a contractor on John Deere tractor control systems and fleet management dashboards.
highlights: Developed for the John Deere tractor control display to create new screen renders and transitions in Qt and C++.
Strong focus in useful SCRUM processes, self-organizing teams, and flexible AGILE methods.
